name: Tower Defense?
description:
A Tower Defense Game Without A Path For Enemies To Follow!

Place Different Towers To Kill Different Types Of Enemies. Use Strategies, Use Brute Force, Do Completely Random Things. Just Make Sure Your Health Is Above 0 Or You Lose!

Have Fun!

I Took Quite A Bit Inspiration From BTD6 For The Towers, Upgrades, And Enemies.

PS I Am Sorry I Didn`t Post Anything, No Projects Were Good Enough To Post.
